snippet: A very messy acrostic by Emily Cox and Henry Rathvon.
abstract: A very messy acrostic by Emily Cox and Henry Rathvon.
lead_paragraph: VARIETY PUZZLE – Although this one gave me a bit of a struggle, it was well worth it. I loved this quote. How much more evocative can you get by describing someone who keeps his pile of “unanswered correspondence” tidy by stabbing them with a knife into the center of a mantelpiece?
